title: Makefile:17: recipe for target 'geth' failed make: *** [geth] Error 2
body:
Hi there,

I'm trying to install geth on Raspberry Pi and I got the titled error. Build log(?) below:

build/env.sh go install -v -ldflags '-X main.gitCommit c541b38fb36587d23c60f5e2f2b9b3c8700ec489' ./cmd/geth
github.com/codegangsta/cli
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/rlp
github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/crypto/ecies

golang.org/x/crypto/scrypt

github.com/syndtr/goleveldb/leveldb
github.com/huin/goupnp/ssdp

**# github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/crypto/secp256k1
malformed DWARF TagVariable entry**
github.com/robertkrimen/otto/file
github.com/robertkrimen/otto/token
github.com/robertkrimen/otto/dbg

Makefile:17: recipe for target 'geth' failed
make: *** [geth] Error 2

I'm guessing 

> # github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/crypto/secp256k1
> malformed DWARF TagVariable entry

 is the issue and if so, how do I fix it please?
Saw a similar issue posted 3 days ago. Sorry.
